body.1: Only your chosen username and messages posted in the General Chat are stored temporarily.
body.2: No emails, passwords, or personal identifying information are collected.

content.title: Why We Collect It
content.body: These details are necessary for the basic functionality of the application â€” to display usernames and chat messages. No sneaky business here.

content.title: How It's Stored
content.body: Messages you send in rooms are kept only temporarily â€” live, in-memory, and visible to members currently in the room. No storing in localStorage, no databases, nada. When you close or refresh, poof â€” chat vanishes like your last snack at midnight. So, enjoy the moment, but don't expect a replay!

content.title: Data Security
content.body: While efforts are made to protect the stored data, this is a learning project and may not implement production-grade security. So, no promises â€” but we try!

content.title: Third-Party Sharing
content.body: No information is shared with any third parties. This application is entirely self-contained for learning purposes.

content.title: User Rights
content.body: As this is a test project, users may clear their data by clearing browser storage or contacting the developer for manual removal.

footer.title: Contact
footer.body: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to the developer Mayank Pun (gc_mayankpun) through the project repository.
